entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 03:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NNW 42 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of freezing drizzle late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023
